title: Auditions for the Northwestern Community Ensemble

collection.description: The posters within the collection relate to events held on campus, including music and dance performances, film screenings, talks, seminars, panels, book talks, auditions, career fairs, job opportunities, research studies and course openings, among others. Some events reoccur across time.
collection.title: Northwestern University Posters Collection

terms_of_use: The images on this site are from material in the collections of the McCormick Library of Special Collections and University Archives of Northwestern University Libraries, are provided for use by its students, faculty and staff, and by other researchers visiting this site, for research consultation and scholarly purposes only. Further distribution and/or any commercial use of the images from this site is not permitted.

project.desc: The request is to digitize posters from the Archives’ Poster Collection pertaining to Northwestern Community Ensemble, Alice Millar Chapel Choir, Shirei NU, Harmony in Spirit, and Soul 4 Real, and add them to Repository. They will be used as part of upcoming plans to celebrate NU, sacred music groups, in the 2020-2021 academic year for research and promotion.
